title: Deals: Google Nest Wifi systems from $129, Hisense H8 4K ULED Android TVs, more
content:
All of today’s best deals include Google Nest Wifi packages from $129 to go alongside Hisense H8 4K ULED Android TVs starting at $450. Plus, a new all-time low on the Amazfit GTR 3 Pro smartwatch. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Google Nest Wifi systems from $129, Hisense H8 4K ULED Android TVs, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Nest Wifi packages now start from $129 in today's best deals and double as Assistant speakers for some added smart home features.
